mms.controller.interfaces

Interface IManageSocietyController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ManageSocietyController

    public interface IManageSocietyController
    Interface that define the ManageSocietyController.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci, Filippo Nicolini, Alessandro Bagnoli

    • Method Summary
